Can you pull up my Dobsonian telescope building and amateur astronomy workspace?

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731107000000_d6o8b0s2t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731107000000_d1o2b3s4t", "sessionDescription": "Building 12-inch Dobsonian telescope from scratch and conducting deep-sky observations - mirror grinding, mount fabrication, astrophotography", "sessionMemory": "Month 8 of telescope build. Primary mirror: 12-inch diameter, f/5, grinding complete (220 grit), polishing stage started. Secondary mirror: purchased 2.6-inch. Mount: plywood rockerbox 80% complete. Tube: sonotube cut and painted. Focuser and spider ordered. Test: Foucault test shows good sphere. Target completion: April for spring galaxy season. Observation log: 47 deep-sky objects with existing 6-inch scope. Learning: mirror testing, collimation, star party attendance.", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to log tonight's polishing session progress and plan weekend mount assembly", "primaryGoal": "Complete 12-inch Dobsonian telescope, observe 200 Messier objects, contribute to astronomy club outreach", "subgoal": "Finish mirror polishing to 1/8 wave, complete mount assembly, achieve first light by April star party"}, "id": "ws_1731107000000_d1o2b3s4t"}
